document.full_text: the wisconsin judge who blocked the implementation of the state law limiting collective bargaining by public workers threw out one of the three lawsuits on thursday challenging the controversial measure.
document.title: judge dismisses one of three lawsuits on wisconsin law
lines_and_colors: the wisconsin judge who blocked the implementation of the state law limiting collective bargaining by public workers threw out one of the three lawsuits on thursday challenging the controversial measure.
